title: House fires: financial help and fire safety

details.description: Crisis loans can help you after a fire in your home - council, emergency housing, Red Cross, fire safety
details.body:
You could get a crisis loan to help with the costs after a fire. The Red Cross and the council can also help with accommodation and other needs in an emergency.

Crisis Loans

You may be eligible for a Crisis Loan to help with essential costs after an emergency or disaster.

Emergency help

Contact the Red Cross for emergency help with accommodation, clothing, food etc as well as help dealing with insurance companies.

If you have nowhere to stay

Contact your local council. They may be able to help you with emergency housing.

Fire safety

Get fire safety advice on the Fire Kills Facebook page, including information on smoke alarms, making your home safe and help for people with disabilities.
